description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - a) drawings at 1:10 or 1:5 showing section, elevation and moulding/profile details for proposed windows, plus internal framing, shutters and apron where appropriate, and details of materials, finish and colour) and Condition 15 (rear Lower ground floor closet wing window not hereby approved) of Listed Building consent LB/20/04242 (Alteration and renovation works comprising erection of replacement rear infill extension; installation of two dormer windows to front roof slope and single dormer to rear; installation of door and metal balustrade at rear first floor; repair and reinstatement of rear garden boundary wall and gate piers; rationalisation of rear external pipework; and internal alterations)
